About Me

04 Jan 2012

With my passion in real estate, I decided to become a realtor in Naples. I have been working for over 20 years now as a real estate agent. I am committed and focused on keeping my clients with the latest trends in the market place, utilizing the newest tools and statistics available to Naples real estate market. I have the strongest work ethic in real estate and pride myself on it.
